00015         template <typename genIType>
00016         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genIType mask
00017         (
00018                 genIType const & count
00019         )
00020         {
00021                 return ((genIType(1) << (count)) - genIType(1));
00022         }
00023 
00024         VECTORIZE_VEC(mask)
00025 
00026         // highestBitValue
00027         template <typename genType>
00028         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType highestBitValue
00029         (
00030                 genType const & value
00031         )
00032         {
00033                 genType tmp = value;
00034                 genType result = genType(0);
00035                 while(tmp)
00036                 {
00037                         result = (tmp & (~tmp + 1)); // grab lowest bit
00038                         tmp &= ~result; // clear lowest bit
00039                 }
00040                 return result;
00041         }
00042 
00043         template <typename T, precision P>
00044         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec2<int, P> highestBitValue
00045         (
00046                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & value
00047         )
00048         {
00049                 return detail::tvec2<int, P>(
00050                         highestBitValue(value[0]),
00051                         highestBitValue(value[1]));
00052         }
00053

00056         (
00057                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & value
00058         )
00059         {
00060                 return detail::tvec3<int, P>(
00061                         highestBitValue(value[0]),
00062                         highestBitValue(value[1]),
00063                         highestBitValue(value[2]));

00079         // isPowerOfTwo
00080         template <typename genType>
00081         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool isPowerOfTwo(genType const & Value)
00082         {
00083                 //detail::If<std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_signed>::apply(abs, Value);
00084                 //return !(Value & (Value - 1));
00085 
00086                 // For old complier?
00087                 genType Result = Value;
00088                 if(std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_signed)
00089                         Result = abs(Result);
00090                 return !(Result & (Result - 1));
00091         }
00092

00097         )
00098         {

00129         // powerOfTwoAbove
00130         template <typename genType>
00131         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType powerOfTwoAbove(genType const & value)
00132         {
00133                 return isPowerOfTwo(value) ? value : highestBitValue(value) << 1;
00134         }
00135 
00136         VECTORIZE_VEC(powerOfTwoAbove)
00137 
00138         // powerOfTwoBelow
00139         template <typename genType>
00140         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType powerOfTwoBelow
00141         (
00142                 genType const & value
00143         )
00144         {
00145                 return isPowerOfTwo(value) ? value : highestBitValue(value);
00146         }
00147 
00148         VECTORIZE_VEC(powerOfTwoBelow)
00149 
00150         // powerOfTwoNearest
00151         template <typename genType>
00152         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType powerOfTwoNearest
00153         (
00154                 genType const & value
00155         )
00156         {
00157                 if(isPowerOfTwo(value))
00158                         return value;
00159 
00160                 genType prev = highestBitValue(value);
00161                 genType next = prev << 1;
00162                 return (next - value) < (value - prev) ? next : prev;
00163         }
00164 
00165         VECTORIZE_VEC(powerOfTwoNearest)
00166 
00167         template <typename genType>
00168         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType bitRevert(genType const & In)
00169         {
00170                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_integer, "'bitRevert' only accept integer values");
00171 
00172                 genType Out = 0;
00173                 std::size_t BitSize = sizeof(genType) * 8;
00174                 for(std::size_t i = 0; i < BitSize; ++i)
00175                         if(In & (genType(1) << i))
00176                                 Out |= genType(1) << (BitSize - 1 - i);
00177                 return Out;
00178         }
00179 
00180         VECTORIZE_VEC(bitRevert)
00181 
00182         template <typename genType>
00183         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType bitRotateRight(genType const & In, std::size_t Shift)
00184         {
00185                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_integer, "'bitRotateRight' only accept integer values");
00186 
00187                 std::size_t BitSize = sizeof(genType) * 8;
00188                 return (In << Shift) | (In >> (BitSize - Shift));
00189         }
00190 
00191         template <typename T, precision P>
00192         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec2<T, P> bitRotateRight
00193         (
00194                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & Value, 
00195                 std::size_t Shift
00196         )
00197         {
00198                 return detail::tvec2<T, P>(
00199                         bitRotateRight(Value[0], Shift),
00200                         bitRotateRight(Value[1], Shift));
00201         }

00230         template <typename genType>
00231         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType bitRotateLeft(genType const & In, std::size_t Shift)
00232         {
00233                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_integer, "'bitRotateLeft' only accept integer values");
00234 
00235                 std::size_t BitSize = sizeof(genType) * 8;
00236                 return (In >> Shift) | (In << (BitSize - Shift));
00237         }

00278         template <typename genIUType>
00279         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genIUType fillBitfieldWithOne
00280         (
00281                 genIUType const & Value,
00282                 int const & FromBit, 
00283                 int const & ToBit
00284         )
00285         {
00286                 assert(FromBit <= ToBit);
00287                 assert(ToBit <= sizeof(genIUType) * std::size_t(8));
00288 
00289                 genIUType Result = Value;
00290                 for(signed i = 0; i <= ToBit; ++i)
00291                         Result |= (1 << i);
00292                 return Result;
00293         }
00294 
00295         template <typename genIUType>
00296         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genIUType fillBitfieldWithZero
00297         (
00298                 genIUType const & Value,
00299                 int const & FromBit, 
00300                 int const & ToBit
00301         )
00302         {
00303                 assert(FromBit <= ToBit);
00304                 assert(ToBit <= sizeof(genIUType) * std::size_t(8));
00305 
00306                 genIUType Result = Value;
00307                 for(signed i = 0; i <= ToBit; ++i)
00308                         Result &= ~(1 << i);
00309                 return Result;
00310         }

00319 
00320                 template <typename PARAM, typename RET>
00321                 GLM_FUNC_DECL RET bitfieldInterleave(PARAM x, PARAM y, PARAM z, PARAM w);

00332 
00333                 template <typename PARAM, typename RET>
00334                 inline RET bitfieldInterleave(PARAM x, PARAM y, PARAM z)
00335                 {
00336                         RET Result = 0; 
00337                         for (RET i = 0; i < sizeof(PARAM) * 8; i++)
00338                         {
00339                                 Result |= ((RET(x) & (RET(1) << i)) << ((i << 1) + 0));
00340                                 Result |= ((RET(y) & (RET(1) << i)) << ((i << 1) + 1));
00341                                 Result |= ((RET(z) & (RET(1) << i)) << ((i << 1) + 2));

00346                 template <typename PARAM, typename RET>
00347                 inline RET bitfieldInterleave(PARAM x, PARAM y, PARAM z, PARAM w)
00348                 {
00349                         RET Result = 0; 
00350                         for (int i = 0; i < sizeof(PARAM) * 8; i++)
00351                         {
00352                                 Result |= ((((RET(x) >> i) & RET(1))) << RET((i << 2) + 0));
00353                                 Result |= ((((RET(y) >> i) & RET(1))) << RET((i << 2) + 1));
00354                                 Result |= ((((RET(z) >> i) & RET(1))) << RET((i << 2) + 2));
00355                                 Result |= ((((RET(w) >> i) & RET(1))) << RET((i << 2) + 3));
00356                         }
00357                         return Result;
00358                 }
00359 */
00360                 template <>
00361                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER glm::uint16 bitfieldInterleave(glm::uint8 x, glm::uint8 y)
00362                 {
00363                         glm::uint16 REG1(x);
00364                         glm::uint16 REG2(y);
00365 
00366                         REG1 = ((REG1 <<  4) | REG1) & glm::uint16(0x0F0F);
00367                         REG2 = ((REG2 <<  4) | REG2) & glm::uint16(0x0F0F);
00368 
00369                         REG1 = ((REG1 <<  2) | REG1) & glm::uint16(0x3333);
00370                         REG2 = ((REG2 <<  2) | REG2) & glm::uint16(0x3333);
00371 
00372                         REG1 = ((REG1 <<  1) | REG1) & glm::uint16(0x5555);
00373                         REG2 = ((REG2 <<  1) | REG2) & glm::uint16(0x5555);
00374 
00375                         return REG1 | (REG2 << 1);
00376                 }
00377 
00378                 template <>
00379                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER glm::uint32 bitfieldInterleave(glm::uint16 x, glm::uint16 y)
00380                 {
00381                         glm::uint32 REG1(x);
00382                         glm::uint32 REG2(y);
00383 
00384                         REG1 = ((REG1 <<  8) | REG1) & glm::uint32(0x00FF00FF);
00385                         REG2 = ((REG2 <<  8) | REG2) & glm::uint32(0x00FF00FF);
00386 
00387                         REG1 = ((REG1 <<  4) | REG1) & glm::uint32(0x0F0F0F0F);
00388                         REG2 = ((REG2 <<  4) | REG2) & glm::uint32(0x0F0F0F0F);
00389 
00390                         REG1 = ((REG1 <<  2) | REG1) & glm::uint32(0x33333333);
00391                         REG2 = ((REG2 <<  2) | REG2) & glm::uint32(0x33333333);
00392 
00393                         REG1 = ((REG1 <<  1) | REG1) & glm::uint32(0x55555555);
00394                         REG2 = ((REG2 <<  1) | REG2) & glm::uint32(0x55555555);
00395 
00396                         return REG1 | (REG2 << 1);
00397                 }

00401                 {
00402                         glm::uint64 REG1(x);
00403                         glm::uint64 REG2(y);
00404 
00405                         REG1 = ((REG1 << 16) | REG1) & glm::uint64(0x0000FFFF0000FFFF);
00406                         REG2 = ((REG2 << 16) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0x0000FFFF0000FFFF);
00407 
00408                         REG1 = ((REG1 <<  8) | REG1) & glm::uint64(0x00FF00FF00FF00FF);
00409                         REG2 = ((REG2 <<  8) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0x00FF00FF00FF00FF);
00410 
00411                         REG1 = ((REG1 <<  4) | REG1) & glm::uint64(0x0F0F0F0F0F0F0F0F);
00412                         REG2 = ((REG2 <<  4) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0x0F0F0F0F0F0F0F0F);

00415                         REG2 = ((REG2 <<  2) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0x3333333333333333);
00416

00418                         REG2 = ((REG2 <<  1) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0x5555555555555555);
00419

00421                 }

00425                 {

00429

00432                         REG3 = ((REG3 << 16) | REG3) & glm::uint32(0x00FF0000FF0000FF);
00433

00449                 template <>
00450                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER glm::uint64 bitfieldInterleave(glm::uint16 x, glm::uint16 y, glm::uint16 z)
00451                 {
00452                         glm::uint64 REG1(x);
00453                         glm::uint64 REG2(y);
00454                         glm::uint64 REG3(z);
00455                         
00456                         REG1 = ((REG1 << 32) | REG1) & glm::uint64(0xFFFF00000000FFFF);
00457                         REG2 = ((REG2 << 32) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0xFFFF00000000FFFF);
00458                         REG3 = ((REG3 << 32) | REG3) & glm::uint64(0xFFFF00000000FFFF);
00459                         
00460                         REG1 = ((REG1 << 16) | REG1) & glm::uint64(0x00FF0000FF0000FF);
00461                         REG2 = ((REG2 << 16) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0x00FF0000FF0000FF);
00462                         REG3 = ((REG3 << 16) | REG3) & glm::uint64(0x00FF0000FF0000FF);
00463                         
00464                         REG1 = ((REG1 <<  8) | REG1) & glm::uint64(0xF00F00F00F00F00F);
00465                         REG2 = ((REG2 <<  8) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0xF00F00F00F00F00F);
00466                         REG3 = ((REG3 <<  8) | REG3) & glm::uint64(0xF00F00F00F00F00F);
00467

00470                         REG3 = ((REG3 <<  4) | REG3) & glm::uint64(0x30C30C30C30C30C3);
00471

00489 
00490                         REG1 = ((REG1 << 16) | REG1) & glm::uint64(0x00FF0000FF0000FF);
00491                         REG2 = ((REG2 << 16) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0x00FF0000FF0000FF);
00492                         REG3 = ((REG3 << 16) | REG3) & glm::uint64(0x00FF0000FF0000FF);

00509                 template <>
00510                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER glm::uint32 bitfieldInterleave(glm::uint8 x, glm::uint8 y, glm::uint8 z, glm::uint8 w)
00511                 {
00512                         glm::uint32 REG1(x);
00513                         glm::uint32 REG2(y);
00514                         glm::uint32 REG3(z);
00515                         glm::uint32 REG4(w);
00516                         
00517                         REG1 = ((REG1 << 12) | REG1) & glm::uint32(0x000F000F000F000F);
00518                         REG2 = ((REG2 << 12) | REG2) & glm::uint32(0x000F000F000F000F);
00519                         REG3 = ((REG3 << 12) | REG3) & glm::uint32(0x000F000F000F000F);
00520                         REG4 = ((REG4 << 12) | REG4) & glm::uint32(0x000F000F000F000F);
00521                         
00522                         REG1 = ((REG1 <<  6) | REG1) & glm::uint32(0x0303030303030303);
00523                         REG2 = ((REG2 <<  6) | REG2) & glm::uint32(0x0303030303030303);
00524                         REG3 = ((REG3 <<  6) | REG3) & glm::uint32(0x0303030303030303);
00525                         REG4 = ((REG4 <<  6) | REG4) & glm::uint32(0x0303030303030303);
00526                         
00527                         REG1 = ((REG1 <<  3) | REG1) & glm::uint32(0x1111111111111111);
00528                         REG2 = ((REG2 <<  3) | REG2) & glm::uint32(0x1111111111111111);
00529                         REG3 = ((REG3 <<  3) | REG3) & glm::uint32(0x1111111111111111);
00530                         REG4 = ((REG4 <<  3) | REG4) & glm::uint32(0x1111111111111111);
00531                         
00532                         return REG1 | (REG2 << 1) | (REG3 << 2) | (REG4 << 3);
00533                 }
00534                 
00535                 template <>
00536                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER glm::uint64 bitfieldInterleave(glm::uint16 x, glm::uint16 y, glm::uint16 z, glm::uint16 w)
00537                 {
00538                         glm::uint64 REG1(x);
00539                         glm::uint64 REG2(y);
00540                         glm::uint64 REG3(z);
00541                         glm::uint64 REG4(w);
00542 
00543                         REG1 = ((REG1 << 24) | REG1) & glm::uint64(0x000000FF000000FF);
00544                         REG2 = ((REG2 << 24) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0x000000FF000000FF);
00545                         REG3 = ((REG3 << 24) | REG3) & glm::uint64(0x000000FF000000FF);
00546                         REG4 = ((REG4 << 24) | REG4) & glm::uint64(0x000000FF000000FF);
00547 
00548                         REG1 = ((REG1 << 12) | REG1) & glm::uint64(0x000F000F000F000F);
00549                         REG2 = ((REG2 << 12) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0x000F000F000F000F);
00550                         REG3 = ((REG3 << 12) | REG3) & glm::uint64(0x000F000F000F000F);
00551                         REG4 = ((REG4 << 12) | REG4) & glm::uint64(0x000F000F000F000F);
00552 
00553                         REG1 = ((REG1 <<  6) | REG1) & glm::uint64(0x0303030303030303);
00554                         REG2 = ((REG2 <<  6) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0x0303030303030303);
00555                         REG3 = ((REG3 <<  6) | REG3) & glm::uint64(0x0303030303030303);
00556                         REG4 = ((REG4 <<  6) | REG4) & glm::uint64(0x0303030303030303);
00557 
00558                         REG1 = ((REG1 <<  3) | REG1) & glm::uint64(0x1111111111111111);
00559                         REG2 = ((REG2 <<  3) | REG2) & glm::uint64(0x1111111111111111);
00560                         REG3 = ((REG3 <<  3) | REG3) & glm::uint64(0x1111111111111111);
00561                         REG4 = ((REG4 <<  3) | REG4) & glm::uint64(0x1111111111111111);
00562 
00563                         return REG1 | (REG2 << 1) | (REG3 << 2) | (REG4 << 3);
00564                 }
00565         }//namespace detail
00566 
00567         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER int16 bitfieldInterleave(int8 x, int8 y)
00568         {
00569                 union sign8
00570                 {
00571                         int8 i;
00572                         uint8 u;
00573                 } sign_x, sign_y;
00574 
00575                 union sign16
00576                 {
00577                         int16 i;
00578                         uint16 u;
00579                 } result;
00580 
00581                 sign_x.i = x;
00582                 sign_y.i = y;
00583                 result.u = bitfieldInterleave(sign_x.u, sign_y.u);
00584 
00585                 return result.i;
00586         }
00587

00589         {
00590                 return detail::bitfieldInterleave<uint8, uint16>(x, y);
00591         }
